website_summaries.verdict: A flattering, inexpensive rash guard in colors that will match almost any trunks. Comes in extended sizes, but the fit is unpredictable in larger shirts.
pros: Loose-fitting, stylish design that comes in several colors
Crew neckline, with short sleeves and attractive contrast panel
Colors and material hold up well
cons: Some say this shirt has an odd fit — like you're wearing it backwards
Sizing may be a little off in larger sizes

customer_reviews.title: Great Sport Shirt!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice sporty shirt. My husband has been wearing it all summer with no problem. It is light weight, blocks out the sun rays, wears great in the ocean, dries fast, machine washable, still looks like brand new after wearing all summer long. My husband also wears this while out fishing. This shirt is true to size. I would recommend this to friends and family. If this review was at all helpful, please let me know by clicking on helpful. Thank you so much!! :)
customer_reviews.author: phillygrl

customer_reviews.title: A nice but simple rashguard shirt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shirt for vacation in Mexico where we thought we'd be snorkeling (didn't end up going), but still wore the shirt around the beach and while swimming. It's a simple shirt, dries quickly, and isn't too clingy getting out of the water. I normally wear 2xl shirts, but ordered the 2xl and 3xl of this shirt, and the 3xl shirt fit the best.
customer_reviews.author: harrytrichome

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fits as expected. I bought this for a family trip to Aruba and it held up for 10 days. I actually bought several different colors and they all performed great. The white shirts did stain a bit from suntan lotion. But once thoroughly washed the stains came out. I have no complaints about the shirts. They did not stick to much when I got out of the water and they dry quickly and we're comfortable. They did not itch or cause any rashes. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Mikey NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt - feel confident in the pool or on the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. It's incredibly comfortable, doesn't hold on to water, and looks good! Most importantly, it spares the other pool-goers from having to be intimidated by the raw animal beauty of my impressively large torso. I wear a 2XL T-shirt (I'm average height, 5'9"). The 2XL in this shirt fit - but was a bit too snug for my comfort (solely from a visual perspective - it wasn't physically uncomfortable. Just contoured a bit too close to me). I ended up going with the 3XL for a more comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Novum

customer_reviews.title: They block the sun and wick moisture away
customer_reviews.text: I am literally deep in the heart of dense jungle in Costa Rica. 8 miles from any major road. It is hot and humid with glaring hot sun. I am very fair skinned. I bought two of these Kanu shirts and am AMAZED at how well they are protecting me from the sun! It has saved me from having to apply tons of sunblock and it is the first article of clothing that has truly wicked moisture away and does not look wet. I can definitely and whole-heartedly recommend these shirts! Buy a size larger to fit looser and more comfortably. I will be buying more of these INCREDIBLE shirts!
customer_reviews.author: denny48

customer_reviews.title: Began fraying immediately
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this shirt, but after a couple of days of wearing it while snorkeling, it has begun to fall apart. It has not been through a washing machine or dryer, just rinsed with freshwater and hung to dry after each day. The photo shows the back of the shirt, near the neck, and you can clearly see the fabric is fraying. I can't figure out what could cause this, as all it has been exposed to is intense tropical sun, water (salt and fresh), and air. I can't recommend this shirt, as I've had other rash guards that have stood up to years of abuse without showing such signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lipps

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs - protects from sunburn and dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to protect me from sunburn when helping my kids in the pool on our vacation. They would slide down the water slide, I would catch them, and I didn't get sunburned on my back/shoulders where I usually get it so badly. I wrung it out, put it on the hotel tub for the night, and it was almost completely dry the next evening when I needed it again, so it dries pretty fast. I'm a big guy (normally somewhere between a 2X and 3X t-shirt), so I ordered a 4X expecting it to be huge, and it just fits. So these run rather small.
customer_reviews.author: engineer2001

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to the expensive brands made with lycra.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a slim guy, and the XXL fit well, fairly baggy still (these are not spandex/lycra, just polyester so they are flattering for big and tall). I'd say no sun got through at all, and it does wring out and dry out faster than a cotton t-shirt worn in the water. Would work well as workout gear but its not as thinly woven (likely the source of the SPF is the density of the fibers/weave) so not exactly the same as 'heat gear'.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know what you want!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to protect myself from chafage thinking that I didn't want to be one of those posers in a super tight muscle shirt trying to show off- come to find out, those other rashguards are tight for a reason! For the pool this might be fine- but for surfing or swimming in moving water: DANG the nipple chafage was horrible. Made me want to duct tape my nips to protect em haha. Just make sure you research what kind of rashguard you want first. Other then that, this has been great! Love the material and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Trump

customer_reviews.title: It’s so small!!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is a joke for taller guys I am usually a 2xl i am 6’2 260 pounds and a 2xl usually fits great so I order a 2x and it’s tiny literally a small on me and then I ask for a return and I have a week to send it back or I get charged and they send me a 3xl which is normally really big on me in regular shirts and this shirt again is barely down to my waist and is very small their sizing is ridiculous not made for bigger guys imo. I’ve shown 2 pictures the blue is their shirt and the pink is a regular 3x on me
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thorwaldson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt! He's never been comfortable shirtless (even though he's an average build) and this also adds sun protection, so it's a win-win. It's not as thick of material as some other rash guards I've seen in store (think West Marine), but seems to offer good protection at a much better price point. It is true to size. I washed it in the washing machine on our normal settings and then hang dry or lay it flat to dry and after about 6 uses it looks great. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Order big!
customer_reviews.text: My husband usually wears a 2x in a tee (size 50 chest). After reading reviews to order big, We ordered a 4x and it fits good. A nice relaxed fit. They washed up good but I didn't dare dry them in the dryer for fear they would shrink up. Exiting the water, the shirt clinged tight to the chest but was easily pulled away from the body and fit comfortably once again.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not true to size width and length
customer_reviews.text: Honest truth about the product. I am a big guy and weigh about 310 pounds but it's not all fat more like a football player. I'm about six foot one with a long torso. This shirt is not your traditional 3XL size it's much shorter and very tight. Most likely I can wear 2X and most of my clothes are 2x but I decided to buy this larger because it's going to be worn on the beach or the the lake. You need to read this if you're a plus-size guy I need to go up a couple of sizes or look at a different option from a different manufacturer. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Jay R.

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Larger than size chart predicts. The head hole is too big and the sleeves and body are very full. It just hangs on me. See picture. Does not fit close to the body like the swim shirt in the picture. I am 6'1" and chest is exactly 43 inches. Based on the size chart a large should be perfect for me for this shirt. Large t-shirts and rash guards always fit snug and close to me. I have never worn a medium in anything. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderrg

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1. UPF 50 sun protection 2. This fits like a normal T shirt unlike most rashguards which are 1-2 sizes too small. I am 6'1" 185 lbs athletic build and wear between large and XL T-shirts. I got this rashguard in a Large size and it fits perfectly 3. Good quality material 4. The neon orange color is great for visibility CONs None
customer_reviews.author: 2007pony

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size bigger than you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: As a 6'5" broad shouldered guy, I normally wear 2XLT or 3XLT shirts depending on the make. I bought this size 3X rashguard and when I put it on, it looked like someone took a can of spray paint and just let loose. The quality seems pretty good and the material was pretty comfortable, it's just that I wasn't in the market for what looked like a muscle shirt 2 sizes too small. I have returned the 3X rashguard and waiting on the 4X to come in. I'll update this review once it arrives and I try it on.
customer_reviews.author: ShorttyNAZ

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: As a large bellied man I am always afraid that regular shirts will be pulled high. This one did not and reached down to the pockets of my junks. I made sure it was a snug fit yet was comfortable and stuck to me well without filling up and billowing out while in the water. Getting onto river tubes was a big harder though as the material has a rough grip feel when on rubber so rolling over in the tube was very difficult. It did wisk away water quickly so it doesn't function well as a cooling shirt as the water will evaporate fast in the sun and the shirt will be bone dry in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Keo

customer_reviews.title: Great Swimshirt
customer_reviews.text: I buy this swim shirt for my husband who sunburns easily. It is light weight, dries quickly and very comfortable to wear. I have purchased several of these shirt in different colors for him to wear when we go to tropical resorts. My husband loves them! I always order one size up from what his usual t-shirt size is and they fit perfectly. He does not like a tight fitting t-shift. He normally wears and x-large t-shirt so I order an xx-large in this swim shirt. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but need to order a size up if you don't want cling
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a work "forced fun" (that actually was fun) activity that I didn't need any of my co-workers to see my flabby belly or my sweater-like body hair where we were getting wet on a boat ride near Niagara Falls. I read other reviews that said to order up if you didn't want a clingy shirt. Because of this, I marked it as "somewhat small" as I went up a size and got a t-shirt like fit that I get in my normal size. For the price and the speed of shipping, I'll buy a couple more for an upcoming vacation to coordinate with my bathing suits!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mattinson

customer_reviews.title: Good UV protection!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to get a sunburn while wearing these, so they work in that respect. They are also comfortable in and out of the water. Many reviewers mentioned ordering a size up, which I did, and found it was too large, so I ended up ordering a second shirt in the size I typically wear (medium). I'm about 5'10 and 165 and medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT PLUS!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first of these shirts to wear at the beach for cover up. This past winter I also discovered they make a great undershirt, both warm and comfortable. They are very durable, easy to care for, don't shrink like cotton (make sure you follow washing instructions just in case). Not much more expensive than a good cotton t-shirt and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this shirt. Nice pattern for shoulder movement, the material is soft and comfortable, and lays nicely on the torso. For paddling on a surf board I might want a size larger than normal. In other words, it fits fine as a tee shirt, but may just be a wee bit tight for the range of motion needed on the board. I am going to withhold judgment on that until I try it out on the waves, but I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: William MartinTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenage son, who is now grown-up sized, at about 5'11" and 215 lbs. We bought the 3x, because he doesn't like skin-tight clothing. He generally likes a size 2x t-shirt, which are quite baggy on him, and this fits him exactly the same way. I'd say if a person generally wears a size 3x clothing, though, this would be much too small. Apart from being super tight, I don't think it's long enough to fit over much of a belly.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for bigger guys.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 300 lbs. plus man and wanted something to wear to the waterpark to make myself feel a little more comfortable. The shirt does the trick and feels nice, I just wish it was an inch or two longer so it would stay tucked in better. That's really the only complaint I have with it ( and why I have it 4 out of 5 stars) and even then it's not that big of a deal. I agree with the other reviewers in its best to go a size up than you normally wear. The sizing is on the smaller side
customer_reviews.author: Sewerurchin

customer_reviews.title: Superb rash guard!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rash guard for my trip to Hawaii as I am prone to getting burned by the sun. I wore it in and out of the water and it helped me avoid getting burned. I ordered the large because I normally wear XL shirts and it fit perfectly. I am 6’ 2” so it was a little short towards the bottom but it didn’t bother me because I wanted it to fit snug while I was swimming. I highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jonno

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my vacation that I’m going on in 2 weeks. I noticed it’s a little bigger than I thought I’m a 22 year old 5’5, 160 pounds but I wanted a lose fit because my other spf 50 shirt is a medium and it’s kinda tight. I will this shirt is way light than in the picture but it’s fine because my swim shorts are blue as well
customer_reviews.author: Asad Barron

customer_reviews.title: Great in the heat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this material in the hot weather and the shirt is a great fit. The only down side of this material is that after a few wash's the shirt start's to get little fur ball's on it. Now I may not be washing it right so it may be something Im doing wrong. Also this is happening to my other brand name shirt's made from the same material. A big plus to this material is that the dog hair doesn't stick to it... For all my fellow animal lover's.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected, Dries Quickly, never fades and a fabulous price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but only gave it 4 stars because it does run a size smaller. Since its an item for recreation, I'm not too concerned. I just bought a bigger size. The best attribute of this prodcut is how quickly it dries! Additionally, I've had several of these SPF shirts over the years, from Kanu, and they never fade! Aditionally, when I can buy a bigger mans size for $19.00, that is a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chuck Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with product and return guidelines
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 shirts - 1 green, 1 blue. Nice shirts, good material and functional. My work did not allow this style to be worn when I brought them in to show. I returned both shirts in the same package and was only refunded for 1 shirt at first. I should have sent each item in separate parcels. It took a bit, however both items were refunded successfully. Bravo and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ilove2run

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt...good price...but fits "slim" even for being B&T
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice shirt...but a little short for taller guys. Also, feel like a "slimmer" cut even for a big and tall shirt (muscle guys would probably like this). Seems to be very well made...I like the color blocking. I'm including two pictures...one shows the measurement across the chest. The other...shows me measuring from the neck to the bottom hem. Try measuring a similar shirt you have and this will give you an idea of the sizing before you order. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: jreviewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rashguard for Dive Trip!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rash guard with a loose fitting design. My husband is very modest and does not care for tight fighting clothes or rash guards. This is the perfect shirt for our scuba diving vacations to Bonaire. The rashguard is loose fitting like a normal t-shirt, but has all of the advantages of a rash guard. The material is light and breezy allowing you to stay cool but be protected from the harmful UV rays. The rashguard dries quickly making transitions from the water to the next adventure a breeze. The grey color is a nice charcoal grey with some subtle black accents along the sides of the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: scubasarah

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt for covering up!
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt to keep me covered while swimming. The fabric is really comfortable. It dries quickly when I am out of the water. It does stick to me just a little bit when leaving the water. Just a quick tug though and it is free. I have not once had it cling back to me again after the initial pulling it free. There is plenty of room in the shoulders to move and be able to swim. I'm not sure if it is SPF rated or anything like that - but I have not gotten sunburned even a little bit while wearing it. I burn easily so this is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shirt for a trip to Charleston. It worked great for our time on Folly beach. It fits well, seems very well made, not cheap material; a little tight in the front neck area but not uncomfortably so. It dries off fairly quickly once out of the water. It kept the sun off, great product!
customer_reviews.author: CTtech D

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Works well
customer_reviews.text: This fits well. Looks good and works great for keeping the sun off of my body when I need a break from the sun. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Sun shirt
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded our expectations based on the sale ad. They fit exactly as portrayed. We used them all summer long and they still look new which speaks to their quality. I think you will find them a great addition to your sun blocking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hubby or son
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teen son to wear to the beach. He didn't want to wear it (the young are so foolish!!) but after the first day didn't mind covering up his muscles at all. Quick drying and doesn't drag in the water. Held it shape very well too. I washed it at least 10 times and it never faded. Hoping son and his muscles can wear it again next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Second Grade Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Larger sizes comes with larger neck hole.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. Although the size of the shirt fits him well the company made the neck hole larger as well and it drapes down on him in the front. He is not fond of that at all and wishes it was closer to his neck. He only wears it in pools that only allow swim shirts and not regular shirts to be worn. He still prefers to wear one of his old shirts to swim in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, get the next size up.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much everything has been said about this item already. It works great, dries quickly, is comfortable, and inexpensive. And, as many have stated, definitely runs small, at least a full size small. (Unless you like super tight shirts. I was expecting something semi-loose that fit like a normal t-shirt so that it could dry quickly. Nope. Tight.) **edit** After doing some more research, it does seem these 'rashguard' shirts are supposed to run tight. So if that's the intent, it does it well. It's not body-suit tight but certainly tighter than a t-shirt of the same size. I have since ordered the loose-fit version, let's hope that fits more like I'm hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Dye came off
customer_reviews.text: Used only once but fits fine. The only issue is the coloring was washing off. I didn't wash it when I used it for the very first time. When my wife took the shirt to wring out the water, the dye was washing off. She put more water on it and more dye came off. I didn't wash it in the washing machine. Too scared for that. I will still wear it but is that normal for the dye to come off?
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection even though it was too large
customer_reviews.text: I got a horrible sunburn prior to a kayaking trip so I needed something to prevent it from happening again. I accidentally ordered way to big while I was half asleep but I was able to tie the shirt and it actually looked good. It prevents the sun from from making a bad sunburn even worse and it was a cooler morning when we first got into the river so it kept me warm in the morning and cooler when the sun got real hot. I’d recommend buying your normal size the sleeves are pretty long when you size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kaibrow

customer_reviews.title: Kanu Surf Men's shirt
customer_reviews.text: I first want to say I love this shirt. the size fits perfect. the material feels great even after being washed a few times. the color hasn't faded. I do wish there was more colors to choose from. I have four shirts so I guess I'm good for now.
customer_reviews.author: Tylerphilapil

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Indeed, they do fit a bit small. If you want room, go up a size from your normal. I am a 3XL on the verge of being back in a 2XL in a lot of shirts, and the 4XL fit, granted with a little room, but not huge at all. They do retain a little water when swimming, but not near as heavy as a regular t-shirt. But overall it is a very nice shirt, well made, simple colors so it can match multiple trunks, and available for us big guys. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Family est. 2006Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Run very small and narrow in shoulders
customer_reviews.text: These run extremely small. Order TWO sizes up! I’m 6’4” 280 and usually a 3xl tall. 3x went down to my belly button. Returned for a 5x and it barely fits. It’s still a little shorter than I like and definitely narrow in the shoulders. These are cut for short, round guys, not tall, broad shouldered guys. I paid just $19 so I’m keeping it, but won’t be buying more. Definitely not as good of a fit as the Oneil 24/7 surf shirts that are twice as much money. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Prometheus

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: My husband typically wears a 3xl in every shirt. He wanted something to cover himself when we go to the beach, but wanted something loose fitting. This fits tight everywhere...especially the stomach. It is very unflattering unless you are toned. He plans on trying the 5xl to see if it offers the looseness he desires. Will update when we get that in.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni

customer_reviews.title: The Hub loved it
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a big guy and very rarely will wear swim trunks without some sort of top. This was very light weight. It fit my husband perfectly and he actually loved the light weight feel of it. Went swimming without issue and loved how quickly it dried. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A

customer_reviews.title: OK shirt but not the best when swimming laps
customer_reviews.text: If all you do is play in a pool or jump waves in the ocean this shirt is probably ideal. Certainly provides UV protection. If you are a lap swimmer, this shirt does not stay tight to the body and adds some degree of resistance. I found it useful to tuck the shirt into my swimsuit. This helped for a while but at the 1 mile point the shirt was out though less floppy than the first day when I wore it outside the suit from the get go. Takes a while to dry- not a rapid dry in the sun as I thought it might be. Had to struggle a bit to peel it off while still wet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex on the Cape

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size...I’m 6”5 & 290 and normally wear 3x which is usually loose. I knew this would be tighter than normal due to just being a swim shirt but this fits like a XL. Really, why can’t anything fit right. Other than that, the material and build seems to be good quality. Only wore it once though so we will see what time has.
customer_reviews.author: micah brown

customer_reviews.title: Is more of a dry fit shirt and not a swim shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband and it arrived day before our Caribbean vacation to wear for snorkeling. It was not form fitting or similar fabric or stretch as the women’s swim shirt I purchased therefore he did not take for our trip. Seemed similar to a dry fit shirt and not a swim shirt. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Hubby likes the fit & weight of the fabric. Runs true to size. Sadly, the orange of the Kanu Surf Men's Barracuda rash guards is NOT the same color of the Kanu Surf Men's surf short which is contrary to the images shown. See pic for the variance in the two pieces. Kanu. This shirt color is MUCH lighter than advertised
customer_reviews.author: D, Sanatoga, PA

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big guy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy, and I know not everyone likes seeing a big guy shirtless around the pools. Also, I hate sunburns, so daughters bought it for me, for upcoming trip. It does fit a little smaller that a typical t-shirt, but that is expected for a swim shirt (or else it would be too baggy). Tried it in the home pool and worked great. Even though it is black, it did not make me feel hot in the pool. The wet material helps keep cool even in direct sun. As the shirt dries poolside though it might get warm, but I prefer to sit the shade, so not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: RnD Hahn

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a size XXL (beer gut, broad shoulders, 6'1" tall) and I ordered an XXXXL based on reviews.I'm glad I did. It fits like a t shirt, but not too tight. It was long enough and had enough room in the chest and shoulders. It's light in the water and dries quickly, but tends to form a suction when I get out of the water. No biggie. Being of Irish descent, I need some form of protection from the Texas sun, lest I burst into flame upon stepping outdoors. This shirt does the trick. Order it larger than you need and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large (loose fit!) . Great Color! Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! My teen son normally likes to wear a large in a t-shirt, but they do fit loose. Based on the reviews, we selected a medium and it is perfect - still loose fit! Love the vibrant color and quick dry material! I have to admit, he looks sharp! He is 5'8" and 150 lbs if this helps anyone. UPDATE: I just had to come back and update. My husband has never worn a rash guard in his life. He saw my son's and tried it on! He immediately wanted one! He is normally a medium and he wore a medium just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the shame at bay.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this hides my very American mid section and keeps some of the sun off of my blinding white skin. With the added benefit of not scaring away everyone at the pool, this earns good marks. It quickly sheds water when you get out of the pool arriving to a point that it's not clinging to you for more than a few minutes when you leave the water, which is nice so you don't totally look like a beached whale. Hopefully my time at the gym and eating yard work will pay off so I wont need forever, but until then, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and I love the SPF protection
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered Large but I guess their sizing isn't what I'm used to. I returned the Large (easy-to-do!) and got X-Large. All set now!
customer_reviews.author: Mike DeLisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shirt... BUT, The Colors May Not Be As Adverised.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected nice looking shirt, but the shirt orders Royal Blue was NOT as shown in the picture and didnt come close to match the athletic suit I bought it for I'm keeping it is nice, cool, and comfortable for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Air show 23

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit with great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my 19 year old son for sun protection on our beach vacation this year. He really liked the loose fit and light feel of this swim shirt. The fabric dried quickly and definitely provided the protection needed to prevent burning.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials, but far too short
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally need a tall in anything, but this shirt did not even reach the waist of my swimsuit. The shirt fit fine otherwise, it was just very short. I returned it and ordered a tall replacement. I am only 5'11". Odd.
customer_reviews.author: ♥ Books and gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Comfortable, but Sizes Way Big
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a large work or dress shirt (which can fit a little snug across my back), so after reading prior reviews, I decided I had better go a size larger than usual, so I got an XL. It's not worth the hassle of exchanging, but it's definitely a size, or maybe even two, too big, and hangs off me with a wide neck opening. And while the shirt is comfortable, as you can see from the product photo, it hangs loose and will be just about completely ineffective as a rash guard or a swim shirt. Not sure if I'll purchase another one or look for a product that is more of a true rash guard.
customer_reviews.author: The CB Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Order one size down
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He normally wears an XL t shirt. Should have ordered a large. Didn’t take into consideration that it slightly stretches once wet. It does the job and looks good. Even slightly oversized
customer_reviews.author: dirtfox13

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Men!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 3XL, womens. Could not find one big enough for me to be comfortable in. Bought this and it fit wonderfully. I did have to wear a specific swimsuit under it, as the chest padding on my normal swimsuit was very evident. My other top was totally padded so it didn't show. Wore this in El Paso for a day at the waterpark. I am a pale person from Michigan, so it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby7

customer_reviews.title: sizing is way off for bigger sizes
customer_reviews.text: received pretty quick looks well made but went to put it on and it felt 2 sizes too small i wear a loose 4xl or 3xlt but this fit like a 2xl but instead of returning i gave it to a nephew and it fits him good
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Go 2 sizes higher
customer_reviews.text: I went 1 size up as recommended by other reviewers......should have went 2 higher. Normally a 2X-3X in shirts from stores like DXL and CasualMale XL, ordered XXXX-Large and this shirt is too small, should have went XXXXX-Large. 6ft 1inch tall guy, 300 lbs, 44-46" waist, (weight mostly in stomach) this shirt too tight around stomach and a little restrictive in shoulder area.
customer_reviews.author: Auswak (Prime Since 2006)

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and provides good coverage. It gets 4 stars as it takes ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and provides good coverage. It gets 4 stars as it takes forever for this thing to dry out. My brother has a rashguard shirt from another company and his was consistently dry a long time before mine was. I don't know what his cost was so there may be a big price difference. I have got a lot of use out of this shirt this summer but I will be looking into another source before I buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. My bf has been using a huk shirt as a swim shirt, but it’s just gotten worn out after several years of use. He is a usual 3x, which is what we ordered and it fits good. True to size. Nice lightweight and exactly what he wanted. Wish I could get the same thing in a sleeveless t cut. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable and loose for surfing and provide good UV protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these in different colors. I live on the Pacific Coast Highway near San Diego...so I'm in the water a lot! These are comfortable and loose for surfing and provide good UV protection. They dry out very quickly, hold their shape and look pretty good! I sometimes wear them even if not going in the water! For the price, I think these rash guards are a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Corey B. Cather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this 3 days before vacation. Couldn’t find them in the stores, thankfully Amazon saved them day with super fast shipping. Shirt was perfect, my son likes it so much he wears it when not swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not as quick drying as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in water. The shirt feels very nice try, but tends to hold water much longer than I expected. I was looking for someone that would dry fairly quickly like swim trunks would, but this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Bad seam
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for the beach and swimming pool. The fabric felt nice and dried quickly. On the third day, the seam on the right arm started to get undone. There was a long string hanging from the right arm. I cut it off to stave off further fraying. On the fifth day, the seam on the lower back got undone. Rinse and repeat. On the sixth day, it is the seam on the left arm. It is now the ninth day and thankfully nothing else is fraying.
customer_reviews.author: houselord

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend normally wears a 2XL for most of his shirts and 3X shirt fit him well, but if your spouse likes their shirt loose then order a 4X. The material is great and it looks really nice !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: fit as expected however
customer_reviews.text: for a UPF 50 shirt the neck line is huge for a men's shirt. In fact larger than a regular tee shirt. So there is no protection for that sun sensitive skin below the neck. I returned the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Dr G

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a swim shirt that was not stuck to his skin when wearing. This shirt hangs well and is not form fitting. The material is smooth. We purchase the grey and black shirt and he loves it. He doesn't have to worry about having it get dirty like the lighter colors. The fabric is thin allowing you to stay cool in the heat. He is looking forward to getting many uses out of it,
customer_reviews.author: dsclifford1

customer_reviews.title: Runs about 2 sizes smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for use on the lake/beach. I tried the shirt on and it was skin tight. So tight that you could practically see my chest hairs through the fabric. Think I traumatized my kids. Verified that the size was correct. This shirt runs at least 2 sizes smaller than the stated size. Returned for a refund
customer_reviews.author: podmate

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt for Sunburn Prevention
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets sunburned very easily and I wanted to get him something that would protect him on our cruise. He wore this shirt while we sat out in the sun and during our beach excursions and did not burn at all during our week long cruise. It was the first time ever that he did not burn during a summer vacation trip. I will be buying him more shirts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I found this shirt to run at least one size to small if not 2 sizes. It was so small I double checked I ordered and received the correct size, which I did. Instead of returning, I just gave it to my son.
customer_reviews.author: josh miller

customer_reviews.title: Holes in shirt
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shirt maybe once or twice and noticed that there were 3 holes on the side under the seem of the under arm. They were pretty big. I am not a rough swimmer, pretty much just sit in the water while watching the kids. I’m almost positive this shirt came with the holes in them. Unfortunately I am a few days outside of the return period but I will definitely be checking any clothes shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time I ordered one of these shirts. The first order I had to send back due to the seams being not sewn correctly and it was very obvious. This one was as well sewn very poorly but as I purchased it for my husband, he does not really mind. Just be careful to inspect what you receive and give yourself plenty of time to make multiple orders until you get one of decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shirt. I had to buy XXL and XL because of availability. I usually where XXL. Both fit fine and made well. I had no issues with getting sun through the shirt. Very comfortable and wears nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Pepperjack23

customer_reviews.title: Good Shirt, Just A Little Big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for a beach trip. I an 6' 1" with a slim build and i found a size large shirt (mainly the width of the chest and shoulders and the neck hole) to be a little big for me. The shirt serves its purpose and seems to a quality product but next time I'll buy a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Powell

customer_reviews.title: The Right Attire For Water and Sun Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little long because I ordered one size up after reading reviews but I was pleased at how it arrived - well packaged, nice quality, and plenty of info from the company.
customer_reviews.author: An American

customer_reviews.title: To short.. no tall options
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on all the reviews discussing size. I'm a big guy 400 5'11". I enjoy swimming but not in public. I figured this would help me get to a community center pool where I could swim without the anxiety. Alas, the shirt is large enough but to short. Last thing a big guy wants is his stomach hanging out from his shirt. I'll be searching elsewhere for a swim shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Cowabunga Dude
customer_reviews.text: Yeah! Finally something that fits true to size. I'm very happy with this item. Nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Koules

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cut a little short.
customer_reviews.text: Seems decent quality and size is an honest 2XL, but it's cut short for a "Extended-size" shirt. If you're tall and have a gut this shirt will probably ride up in the water and expose it. If you're shorter and/or need the 2XL size for your huge weightlifter shoulders rather than a thick waist, this might be the shirt for you.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T

customer_reviews.title: this is my husband's third one of these
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two others of this same shirt and this color is fun and bright. He liked the others so well that it was an easy decision to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Abring

customer_reviews.title: A nice shirt, but do some reading of Rashguard reviews before you select the size to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 2XL, but after reading a lot of reviews about the rashguards being smaller than expected, I ordered a 3XL. I prefere a loose fitting shirt, and, this shirt was just a tad, and I mean slightly tighter than I prefere. Otherwise, this shirt looks nice, is nicely made, and will serve the purpose that I have bought it for. I am trying to loose some weight, so it will fit better as I progress in my Weight Loss.
customer_reviews.author: Submarine Man 59

customer_reviews.title: Thinks twice b4 buying.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wash clothes before using and this thing shrunk almost 2 sizes jajajaja obviously I can’t return it cause it’s washed, so think twice with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Paniagua

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: I Burn very easily, so a swimming shirt is a necessity. This shirt is perfect, doesnt lose its shape when wet, dries quickly. Looks like a normal shirt wet or dry. It does not lay against the skin, fits like an Undershirt. Seriously, all my Big Guy Brothers, this is a Win!
customer_reviews.author: Steaven DeCarles

customer_reviews.title: Size up 1 size
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this shirt. As he burns easy, he definitely needed it. I did size up because of the reviews and I'm glad I did. The shirt fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan 6

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and wanted snug fit - but collar cuts into neck
customer_reviews.text: I'm six one, 220 and ordered a large to have a snug fit on the beach. The shirt wears short and the collar cuts into my neck. I need to cut it into a v neck to have comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Graleighmom

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 2X shirts and seldom a 3x. That being said, I like my shirts slightly oversized and loosely fitting. I ordered this in 3X because of other reviews that said to order a size up and the shirt fits great. It's comfortable in the pool not only in size, but the material is nice too. I may order another if I start spending more time at the pool this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I will buy more of these shirts
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when I walk daily for exercise. It's very light weight and easy to care for. Pack it in a suitcase and there are no wrinkles, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars.
customer_reviews.text: Really fast drying and I didn't get sun burned, woohoo (I can't afford to any more-I'm dark enough) they lose half a star cause I think the price was a little high for what it is and they lose a whole star for the smell of the darn shirt. I don't know if it was only my shirt that had a foul dirty-dude smell, but I was pissed I didn't notice it prior to taking it to the water park. I had to rinse it before wearing it cause it stunk! Smelled like b.o, no bueno. It had tags and all and the bag was sealed... I think, but either way stinky stinky.
customer_reviews.author: A5

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out and in swimming pool for laps
customer_reviews.text: I do lap swims in pool with 78 degree FAH temperature. Shirt fits snug and after several uses is not stretching. Out of pool it wicks nicely and does not feel hot in bright sun. I live in San Diego area. Fits to size. I use X-large for chest 47 inches and waste 38 inches. Height 5’11” Weight 210 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: A very nice shirt.
customer_reviews.text: While the shirt size seems to run small, that's not the fault of the manufacturer. That aside, the shirt is well-made, comfortable, and does wick perspiration as described. Since I'm Scottish/Irish, I have two colors in the summer, Arctic Pale White and Tomato Red, so this shirt has been a real benefit to me at the beach and pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Brooks, Grand Blanc, MI

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice material and fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband fights me about wearing swim/sun shirts but he loves this one! The material is soft and the fit is good. He has worn it to a couple of water parks this summer. It looks good on him to if I do say so myself :) I would recommend and will buy again when needed
customer_reviews.author: E. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Nice top
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for covering up when you want to swim. It is an attractive shirt with a soft fabric. The downside is that it fits very snug. Of course, it loosens up a bit once you get in the water, but it shows off every curve. Also, if you are tall at all (6 feet or taller) it will be a little bit short on you - not terribly short, but short enough to JUST notice it. Other than that, it is a nice top.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Size up but great swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you size up. My husband wears a 2x but with the reviews, I ordered a 3x. It fits perfect and he says was great for the water park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt looks awesome fit perfectly. Color was just like in the picture black with blue sleeves. Very soft and came nicely wrapped. Would definitely recommend this shirt
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Man

customer_reviews.title: Good swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fits as expected (size XL with 47" Chest). If you are long toros or wear waist low like me it might be a tad short in length but I am ok with it as it covers waistband for me. It is a lightweight, smooth feeling, quick dry poly material. I have had others which were heavy or little scratchy. I would buy again if need another.
customer_reviews.author: CJones

customer_reviews.title: Great for water sports
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Hawaii - my husband wore it on a tubing excursion on a cruise & it was great. The fit was good & it looked nice on him. I would recommend this product wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Former Bookseller

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Just to give you an idea about the fit. I am 6 ft tall with a 59 inch chest. I am a weight lifter, lots of muscle but also carrying around some mid section fat . I normally wear a 4X T-Shirt. This swim shirt runs a little tighter than most 4X shirts. I think 5X would have satisfied me perfectly since it would probably be a bit looser and less form fitting. 5X is currently unavailable, so I went with 4X. Other than the size running a little small, I think the quality and value are right on.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Harper

product_meta.title: Kanu Surf Men's Cb Rashguard UPF 50+ Swim Shirt (Regular & Extended Sizes)
product_meta.description: Kanu Surf presents our newest swim tees with a much looser fit than traditional rash guard for yet more comfort and versatility, Kanu Surf, a surf and swim lifestyle brand, is well known for great fit, function and colors along with high quality functional apparel for the whole family, All of our rash guards are quick dry and feature a UPF 50+ rating to block out the sun's harmful rays, Kanu Swim Tees are designed for surfers of all levels as well as the recreational athlete, They are ideal for running, swimming and working out as the fabric features wicking technology and helps keep moisture away from the body, They are great for trips to the beach or the pool as well as for lounging around, Matching styles for kids are also available so Dads and Kids can hit the beach scene as a team, Available in S-5XL
feature_bullets: Short-sleeve rashguard featuring crew neckline and contrast panels at sides
